en_question:
A factory produces three types of products: I, II, and III, all of which go through two processing stages, A and B. Stage A can be performed on either machine A\textsubscript{1} or A\textsubscript{2}.Stage B can be carried out on any of machines B\textsubscript{1}, B\textsubscript{2}, or B\textsubscript{3}. Processing capabilities: Product I can be processed on any of the A and B machines. Product II can be processed on any A machine, but only B\textsubscript{1} can be used for stage B. Product III can only be processed on A\textsubscript{2} for stage A and B\textsubscript{2} for stage B. The processing time per unit, available machine hours, machine processing cost, raw material cost, and selling price are listed in Table 1-18. Task: Develop an optimal production plan to maximize the factory’s profit, taking into account machine capacity constraints, processing routes, costs, and selling prices.

\bigskip

\noindent \textbf{Table 1-18}

\bigskip

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{Machine}} & \multicolumn{3}{c|}{\textbf{Product}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{Available Hours(h)}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{Processing Cost (dollars/h)}} \\
\cline{2-4}
& \textbf{I} & \textbf{II} & \textbf{III} & & \\
\hline
A\textsubscript{1} & 5 & 10 &  & 6 000 & 0.05 \\
\hline
A\textsubscript{2} & 7 & 9 & 12 & 10 000 & 0.03 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{1} & 6 & 8 &  & 4 000 & 0.06 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{2} & 4 &  & 11 & 7 000 & 0.11 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{3} & 7 &  &  & 4 000 & 0.05 \\
\hline
\textbf{Raw Material Cost (dollars/unit)} & 0.25 & 0.35 & 0.50 &  &  \\
\hline
\textbf{Selling Price (dollars/unit)} & 1.25 & 2.00 & 2.80 &  &  \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
cn_question:
某工厂生产 I、II、III 三种产品，都分别经 A、B 两道工序加工。设 A 工序可分别在设备 A\textsubscript{1} 或 A\textsubscript{2} 上完成，有 B\textsubscript{1}、B\textsubscript{2}、B\textsubscript{3} 三种设备可用于完成 B 工序。已知产品 I 可在 A、B 任何一种设备上加工；产品 II 可在任何规格的 A 设备上加工，但完成 B 工序时，只能在 B\textsubscript{1} 设备上加工；产品 III 只能在 A\textsubscript{2} 与 B\textsubscript{2} 设备上加工。加工单位产品所需工序时间及其他各项数据见表 1-18，试安排最优生产计划，使该厂获利最大。

\bigskip

\noindent \textbf{表 1-18}

\bigskip

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{设备}} & \multicolumn{3}{c|}{\textbf{产品}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{设备有效台时/h}} & \multirow{2}{*}{\textbf{设备加工费/(元/h)}} \\
\cline{2-4}
& \textbf{I} & \textbf{II} & \textbf{III} & & \\
\hline
A\textsubscript{1} & 5 & 10 &  & 6 000 & 0.05 \\
\hline
A\textsubscript{2} & 7 & 9 & 12 & 10 000 & 0.03 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{1} & 6 & 8 &  & 4 000 & 0.06 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{2} & 4 &  & 11 & 7 000 & 0.11 \\
\hline
B\textsubscript{3} & 7 &  &  & 4 000 & 0.05 \\
\hline
\textbf{原料费/(元/件)} & 0.25 & 0.35 & 0.50 &  &  \\
\hline
\textbf{售价/(元/件)} & 1.25 & 2.00 & 2.80 &  &  \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
